articles.title: NBC Sports broadcast teams rise to the occasion with Olympic calls from Milan Cortina
articles.description:
Kenny Albert and A.J. Mleczko nailed it for the network at the conclusion of Team USA's win in women's hockey, and Terry Gannon, Tara Lipinski, and Johnny Weir let Alysa Liu's gold-medal figure skating speak for itself.

The post NBC Sports broadcast teams rise to the occasion with Olympic calls from Milan Cortina appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Al Horford says his decision to leave Celtics was ‘deeper than just the basketball’
